name: For The Entity
description:
Your designs have caught the attention of an unknown organization. They require you to print 120,000$ for their "client" by midnight. The time is 23:45.

You've printed a lot of cash for a lot of people, but this... What is this?

controls:

LEFT CLICK: pick up / move objects

E: interact with machine / insert object into machine

MOUSE WHEEL: adjust mouse sensitivity

- - -

The goal of the game is to print 120,000$. To do this you must figure out how these machines operate, print the money and put it in the briefcase. Keep an eye on the clock and good luck!
